about_the_game:
Find the Gnomes 2:

Get ready for a magical adventure in Find the Gnomes 2. In this colorful game, you'll join a team of friendly gnomes as you explore amazing hand-drawn worlds filled with secrets and surprises.

Your mission? Find all the hidden gnomes in each scene! From bustling cities to vibrant farms, there are cool treasures waiting for you to discover. But it’s not just about finding things—each level has fun puzzles to solve that will challenge your brain!

As you help the gnomes, you'll uncover their exciting stories and learn about their enchanted world. So grab your magnifying glass and get ready to embark on a quest like no other. Can you help the gnomes restore magic to their land? Dive in and find out!


Features:

  • Interactive levels, click and explore!

  • Carefully handcrafted diorama's for each level.

  • Multiple dynamic soundtracks by renown Indie composer Tobi Weiss.

  • Enjoy cartoons that explain the story and background to the gnome world, and unlock cool concept art. All made by renown Dutch cartoonist Meinder.

  • There are 25+ achievements to get.

  • Full controller support and the ability to play with a keyboard and mouse combination.

  • Difficulty adjustments for if you want a more casual gameplay, or if you want to spice things up. Accessibel for all ages!

Find the Gnomes 2:

Get ready for a magical adventure in Find the Gnomes 2. In this colorful game, you'll join a team of friendly gnomes as you explore amazing hand-drawn worlds filled with secrets and surprises.

Your mission? Find all the hidden gnomes in each scene! From bustling cities to vibrant farms, there are cool treasures waiting for you to discover. But it’s not just about finding things—each level has fun puzzles to solve that will challenge your brain!

As you help the gnomes, you'll uncover their exciting stories and learn about their enchanted world. So grab your magnifying glass and get ready to embark on a quest like no other. Can you help the gnomes restore magic to their land? Dive in and find out!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+, SteamOS
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard graphics, shader model 4.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard graphics, shader model 4.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard

name: Find the Gnome 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard

short_description: Help find the cute gnomes hiding behind trees and in the bushes! Explore fun, colorful 3D worlds with lots of cool things to click on and discover. Enjoy cheerful music and fun comics along the way. It's all about having a great time and feeling like you're in a magical adventure!
